price: Na afei monhwie nsuohyeε asotwee ngu ne tiri so.
arabic: ثُمَّ صُبُّواْ فَوۡقَ رَأۡسِهِۦ مِنۡ عَذَابِ ٱلۡحَمِيمِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: thumma ṣubbū fawqa rasihi min ʿadhābi al-ḥamīmi
